result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Matthew O Salami

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
CASES:  13CF344, 14CF38, 15CF11 & 15CF12.  Defendant Matthew O Salami in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Defendant Matthew O Salami in custody.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  BJM-clerk 11:47 am  Amended info to be filed.  Def waives new PSI.  

13CF344 - Def plea of G as to amended Ct 2 & Ct 4.  CT accepts plea, finds Def G, enters JOC as to Ct 2 & Ct 4.  Cts 1, 3, 5 - DRI.

15CF11 - Def plea of G as to amended Ct 1. CT accepts plea, finds Def G as to Ct 1, does not enter JOC due to DJOC.  Cts 2 & 3 - Dismissed.

15CF12 - Def plea of G as to amended Ct 1. CT accepts plea, finds Def G as to Ct 1, does not enter JOC due to DJOC.  Cts 2 & 3 - Dismissed.

Terms of DJOC on 15CF11 & 15CF12:  5 yrs, bound by all non-monetary cond of bond.  $150.00 DJOC fee on each, 60 dtp.  

14CF38 - DRI

All uncharged matters will not be charged.

SENTENCING as to 13CF344
Ct 2:  w/h sent, 3 yr prob, concurrent w/any current prob, restitution incl of surch-to be broke down on JOC-for $3226.19, j/s w/Jasmine Taylor & Maclaine Stener.  Apology ltrs to all victims.  30 days in jail, consec to any conditional time currently sitting.  $290.60 fine.   No DNA surch.  

Ct 4:  w/h sent.  1 yr prob, concurrent w/any current prob.  9 mos banked to be used by probation as necessary.  $265.60 fine.  

PP on both Cts of $25.00/mo due on 4/1/15, & on the 1st day of each month thereafter.  

If all cond of prob have been met, elig for expun on Felony I & H.  12:21 pm adj.
Amended.
Final pre-trial on January 13, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Matthew O Salami in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KK Clerk 8:57AM  CASES:  12CF328, 13CF295, 13CF344 and 14CF38.  Atty Smestad requesting dismissal on case 13CF295.  Court - grants dismissal on 13CF295 w/o prej.  Enter JOC on 12CF328 and Order PSI.  May not possess/use firearm.  No voting.  No body armor.  If not US citizen may face deportation.  Long form PSI - agent does not need to be present.  PSI must be filed on or before 12/23/2014 at Noon.  13CF344 and 14CF38 scheduled for JT and FPT.  Bonds continue on open files adj. 9:08AM  Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 13, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Final pre-trial on October 21, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial on July 14, 2014 at 04:00 pm.
case reassignment order of new Judge.
Final pre-trial on June 11, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Other: must reside w/mother.  Not to possess or consume alcohol- must remain drug and alcohol free.  Subject to testing to determine compliance.  Not to possess or use drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Other: Must follow thru with any of the aftercare treatment that the provider requires.

CASES: 13CF295, 13CF344, 14CF38 Defendant Matthew O Salami in court with attorney Ashley Morse. Kenneth N Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 1:14pm AM- asks to mod to live w/mother. State does not object. Ct mods bond- creates new bond. To have set up aftercare by Friday, May 23, 2014 and notified Atty Smestad. 14CF38 to be transferred to Br 1. Ct modifies 13CF295 on face of bond- No longer on house arrest. Ct vacates bond cond in 13CF344 of needing to be either at home/school/work. bonds cont. 1:30pm adj
Final pre-trial on June 11, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Matthew O Salami in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Defendant Matthew O Salami in custody.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  BAM clerk - 09:07 am - CASES:  14CF38, 13CF295, 13CF344 & 12CF328 - PH in 13CF344 - Ct finds PC and Def is bound over for further proceedings - Info filed - Def enters plea of NG - 13CF328 - Cnt 4 - 90 days PCJ - subject to goodtime - time served - Cnt 5 - 30 days PCJ - time served - concurrent - $265.60 fine/cost on each count - 14CF38 - Ct grants request to modify bond to $5000.00 signature bond to allow Def to go to Tx.  Must be transported directly to Hazeldon - Must sign release with DA's office to confirm Def is a Tx facility and that he remains there.  If Def leaves for any reason must return to PCJ immediately.  Ct modifys face of bond.  Transport will need to have valid DL and insurance.  If not resolved by 6/11 hearing will  be set for 2 day JT. Adj 9:34 am  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 11, 2014 at 08:30 am.
